description: Any type of anti-fog for the mask, goggles an/or hoods would limit the mistake of a healthcare provider reaching under the hood and touching thier face to clear the mask. Simple, cheap and might work. Has this been tried? Even using your own spit is the cheapest way to anti-fog, we do this in diving.
summary: The heat and anxiety have been an issue for health care workers which causes the goggles and hoods to fog. Divers figured this out by using JAWS spit anti-fog.
title: No more fogging
